title: Items Sets
body:
The new launcher is great but, how to make items sets now i can't find it
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body:
You can't edit or create Item Sets in the new client, but you can still use the item sets you've created in the legacy client, so long as you've launched into a game with them using the Legacy Client first!

Let me know if you have any questions.
